text: Ron Goulart (;"Ron Goulart and Sean Joyce's The Phantom! Promo" January 13, 1933 â€“ January 14, 2022) was an American popular culture historian and science fiction author. In the early 1970s, Goulart wrote some scripts for Marvel Comics. In the early 1990s, he wrote Marvel's TekWar comics series. Goulart died on January 14, 2022 in New Haven, Connecticut, one day after his 89th birthday. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American historians Category:American science fiction writers Category:American comics writers Category:Writers from New Haven, Connecticut Category:Writers from Berkeley, California
title: Ron Goulart
